channel.title: Blog | Mario Bašić
channel.description: Blog about latest things in full stack web development and in-depth posts about specific topics.

item.title: Steelseries Apex Raw Resurrection
item.description: Using the lofree Dot wireless mechanical keyboard for 3 days has been painful at best. And because of that I've decided to resurrect my old keyboard which has served me well in the past.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Https domain redirect with Nginx
item.description: After struggling for a day to figure out what needs to be done for this to work, I decided to write it all down in case that I need it again in the future.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Adding comments to your laravel application
item.description: I've received an email yesterday letting me know that someone has created a YouTube video about my package laravelista/comments.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: vendor:publish for the Lumen framework
item.description: After receiving multiple requests to add Lumen 6 support, I realized that people are still using this package.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Abandoned Laravel Extension
item.description: I've realized that there is no need for this extension because you can use Ulauncher shortcuts instead. Let me show you.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Ulauncher Extension for Laravel Documentation
item.description: How I made Ulauncher extension for quick access to the Laravel documentation.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Novela ❤️ Gatsby.js
item.description: Novela makes it easy to start publishing beautiful articles and stories with Gatsby.js.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić

item.title: Where was I for last two years?
item.description: Nearly two years have passed since I have closed down my blog on Laravelista.
item.dc:creator: Mario Bašić
